title: "Pre-Fall" Soraka Model??

embed.description: A healer gifted with the magic of the stars, Soraka holds all living creatures close to her heart. She was once a celestial being, but she sacrificed her immortality and entered the world of mortals. So long as evil threatens life in Valoran, Soraka will not allow herself peace.

body:
Check the page out, and where it has the image of Soraka, click on the 'Pre-Fall' tab.




What's goin on??

replies.body: It is the model for her Divine skin, which in the skin canon is essentially before she broke the rules and fell.
Ohh I see, phew I thought they were gonna change her model or something....never liked the Divine skin :P
